column2:
ℹ️ The following estimations are mostly based on the analysis of the World Record run for the "30 Tracks (Classic)" Speedrun category on Speedrun.com (27/09/2025).
The results are also reported with adjusted values so that the sum of the coverage of all Speed/Handling types is 100%.

ℹ️ The following estimations are mostly based on the analysis of the World Record runs for each Rally.
The results are also reported with adjusted values so that the sum of the coverage of all Speed/Handling types is 100%.
